      • init

        public void init(UtilitySpace utilitySpace,
        Deadline deadlines,
        TimeLineInfo timeline,
        long randomSeed,
        AgentID id)
        Description copied from interface: NegotiationParty
        This is the first call made to a NegotiationParty after its instantiation. Tells which utility space and timeline we are running in. This is called one time only.
        Specified by:
        init in interface NegotiationParty
        Overrides:
        init in class AbstractTimeDependentNegotiationParty
        Parameters:
        utilitySpace - (a copy of/readonly version of) the UtilitySpace to be used for this session.
        timeline - The TimeLineInfo about current session.
        id - the AgentID.

      • getE

        public double getE()
        Description copied from class: AbstractTimeDependentNegotiationParty
        Depending on the value of e, extreme sets show clearly different patterns of behaviour [1]: 1. Boulware: For this strategy e < 1 and the initial offer is maintained till time is almost exhausted, when the agent concedes up to its reservation value. 2. Conceder: For this strategy e > 1 and the agent goes to its reservation value very quickly. 3. When e = 1, the price is increased linearly. 4. When e = 0, the agent plays hardball.
        Specified by:
        getE in class AbstractTimeDependentNegotiationParty
